revised_title: Further Experimental Researches on the Time-Relations of the Excitatory Process in the Ventricle of the Heart of the Frog
tldr: The authors investigate the time-relations of the excitatory process in the ventricle of the frog's heart using a newly constructed instrument called the rheotome. They observe and analyze the electrical changes and the propagation of excitatory states in the heart tissue, providing insights into the underlying mechanisms of heart physiology.
